name: Cart Label
author: Zworthkey

sections.description:
This Plugin will allow the user to customize the default text of woocommerce cart ‘Add to Cart’ to any of its liking.
Users can customize the cart label at the archive page as well as the single page of the product.

Single/Archive Page Product
-Simple products
-Variable products
-Grouped products
-External products
-Bookable products
-Subscription products

Did this plugin will add emojis

Yes it can, just paste emoji to text label.
sections.installation:
1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Click on the Setting option of plugin after activation OR Navigate to ** WooCommerce > Settings > Products > Change “add to cart” labels **.
  4. Customize the label accordingly.
  5. Save Changes and Enjoy!!
sections.faq:
Is this plugin will change the label of custom product type of woocommerce

It Depends upon that plugin. This Plugin just simply get all products existing in woocommerce.
